Example of trainer modelling:
If the trainer is considerate to other people,
demonstrates active learning techniques and handlestraining equipment carefully, participants are likely tobehave in similar ways.
Direct experience has a more powerful impact on
participants than reading about the effects of poormaternal and child health.
Example of providing experience:
